title: Chewy coconut macaroons
description: These moreish mouthfuls are coconut taste bombs suitable for vegetarians, vegans, gluten-free and dairy-free diets.One macaroon provides 55 kcal, 0.7g protein, 3g carbohydrate (of which 1.8g sugars), 4.5g fat (of which 4g saturates), 1.3g fibre and 0.1g salt.
